name: Animal Surf
description:
The game is a simple timekiller. The main goal of the game, go as far as possible and set a record.

The characters in the game are animals floating on the waves on the board. The player can control only the waves themselves, raising or lowering them, the animals themselves are not controlled.

Management in the game is carried out by svaypami. There is also a store of player skins and a set of tasks for which you can get awards
